typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPID1 as string,
		NAME as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		DEPT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EMP
source(output(
		DEPT as string,
		HR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DEPT
ModifyColumns1, DEPT join(EMP@DEPT == DEPT@DEPT,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
EMP derive(COUNTRY = upper(COUNTRY)) ~> ModifyColumns1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DataflowJoin'],
	mapColumn(
		EMPID1,
		NAME,
		COUNTRY,
		DEPT = {DEPT@DEPT},
		HR
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
